Package a3

Class GhostAvatar

java.lang.Object
tage.GameObject
a3.GhostAvatar
public class GhostAvatar extends GameObject
GhostAvatar represents a remote playerâ€™s avatar in the game world, complete with simulated watering-can droplet physics and torch-lighting behavior.

It extends GameObject and manages:

  • Unique client ID and position updates
  • Watering-can visuals and droplet spawning/synchronization
  • Torch object and positional light for torch effects
Author:
Isabel Santoyo-Garcia

  • Constructor Details

    • GhostAvatar

      public GhostAvatar(MyGame game, UUID id, ObjShape s, TextureImage t, org.joml.Vector3f p)
      Constructs a GhostAvatar at the given position with specified shape and texture.
      Parameters:
      game - reference to the main game instance
      id - unique UUID of the remote client
      s - shape used for the avatar model
      t - texture applied to the avatar model
      p - initial world position for the avatar

    • initWateringCan

      public void initWateringCan(ObjShape canShape, TextureImage canTex)
      Initializes the watering-can child object with provided shape and texture. The can starts hidden until watering is enabled.
      Parameters:
      canShape - shape for the watering can
      canTex - texture for the watering can

    • getWateringCanObject
